These Superior rooms consist of one bedroom and one open plan living area and have unlimited sea view. Suitable for 2 or 3 people. They offer both relaxing and comfortable stay.
• Double bed with single mattresses • Sofa • Balcony with sea view • Bathroom with bathtub • Carpet • Work desk • Refrigerator • LCD TV • Pay TV and Satellite TV • Free internet by using a cable and Wi-Fi • Environmentally-friendly mattress COCO-MAT and selected pillows • Luxury cotton towels and slippers • Hair dryer • Safety box • Direct phone line
